Package io.micronaut.http.uri

Interface UriBuilder

public interface UriBuilder
Helper class for building URIs and handle encoding correctly.
Since:
1.0.2
Author:
graemerocher

    • path

      @NonNull @NonNull UriBuilder path(@Nullable @Nullable String path)
      Appends the given path to the existing path correctly handling '/'. If path is null it is simply ignored.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Returns:

    • queryParam

      @NonNull @NonNull UriBuilder queryParam(String name, Object... values)
      Adds a query parameter for the give name and values. The values will be URI encoded. If either name or values are null the value will be ignored.
      Parameters:
      name - The name
      values - The values
      Returns:
      This builder

    • replaceQueryParam

      @NonNull @NonNull UriBuilder replaceQueryParam(String name, Object... values)

      Parameters:

      values - The values
